infos.value: This concludes my explanation. I shall explain Guild Statues and the Barracks in detail once you pay a visit to them.
I shall explain Guild Statues and the Barracks in detail at a later time.
• Lobby •

• Lobby •
This is the Guild Lobby. You can utilize all of your guild's features from here.
• Attendance •

• Attendance •
Here, you can see how many guild members are attending. Members acquire rewards based on the total number of members in attendance and the level of your Guild Statues.
• Gifts •

• Gifts •
Gifts can be sent to fellow Guild Members.
• Menu •

• Menu •
Here, you can look up information about your guild and its members. You can also send Join Requests and Invites, or leave your current guild.
• Shrine •

• Guild Statues •
You can confirm the number of times the Guild Statues can be enhanced via the Lobby.
• Barracks •

• Barracks •
You can confirm the status of your remaining provisions via the Lobby.
• Guild Battles •

• Guild Battles •
You can confirm your guild's battle ranking and league qualification via the Lobby.
• Guilds •
Proceed to a tutorial on Guilds?
Yes
No
